results.title: Metformin, chronic nephropathy and lactic acidosis: a multi-faceted issue for the nephrologist
results.text_hl: @SPECIES_9606 @@@Patients@@@ taking the drug in the face of a concomitant complication which has led to reduced renal clearance of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@, @DISEASE_Vomiting @DISEASE_MESH:D014839 @@@vomiting@@@, general malaise) must discontinue @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

citations.NLM: Mariano F, Biancone L. Metformin, chronic nephropathy and lactic acidosis: a multi-faceted issue for the nephrologist J Nephrol. 2021 Aug;34(4):1127-1135. PMID: 33373028
citations.BibTeX: @article{33373028, title={Metformin, chronic nephropathy and lactic acidosis: a multi-faceted issue for the nephrologist}, author={Mariano F and Biancone L}, journal={J Nephrol}, volume={34}, number={4}, pages={1127-1135}}

results.title: Feeding metformin during pregnancy and lactation periods improved learning and memory impairment in the rat offspring exposed to febrile seizure: Role of oxidative stress and inflammatory response.
results.text_hl: Considering the potential effects of oxidative stress as a prominent trigger in @DISEASE_Seizures_Febrile @DISEASE_MESH:D003294 @@@FS@@@, and demonstrating the anti-oxidant effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, the present study aimed to investigate the protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ administration in prenatal and lactation periods in @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@ pups exposed to @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@hyperthermia@@@ by which induced @DISEASE_Seizures @DISEASE_MESH:D012640 @@@seizure@@@.

citations.NLM: Khoshroo N, Rahimi A, Kakhki S, Kaffashan F, Masoudi M, Baharlou S, Beheshti F. Feeding metformin during pregnancy and lactation periods improved learning and memory impairment in the rat offspring exposed to febrile seizure: Role of oxidative stress and inflammatory response. Int J Dev Neurosci. 2024 Jan 5;():. PMID: 38178780
citations.BibTeX: @article{38178780, title={Feeding metformin during pregnancy and lactation periods improved learning and memory impairment in the rat offspring exposed to febrile seizure: Role of oxidative stress and inflammatory response.}, author={Khoshroo N and Rahimi A and Kakhki S and Kaffashan F and Masoudi M and Baharlou S and Beheshti F}, journal={Int J Dev Neurosci}}

results.title: Phase II trial of nivolumab and metformin in patients with treatment-refractory microsatellite stable metastatic colorectal cancer
results.text_hl: Most common grade 3/4 @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicities@@@: @DISEASE_Anemia @DISEASE_MESH:D000740 @@@Anemia@@@ (n=2), @DISEASE_Diarrhea @DISEASE_MESH:D003967 @@@diarrhea@@@ (n=2), and @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ (n=2). @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ alone failed to increase the infiltration of T-cell subsets in the @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@, but combined @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Nivolumab @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077594 @@@nivolumab@@@ increased percentages of @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@-infiltrating leukocytes (p=0.031).

citations.NLM: Akce M, Farran B, Switchenko JM, Rupji M, Kang S, Khalil L, Ruggieri-Joyce A, Olson B, Shaib WL, Wu C, Alese OB, Diab M, Lesinski GB, El-Rayes BF. Phase II trial of nivolumab and metformin in patients with treatment-refractory microsatellite stable metastatic colorectal cancer J Immunother Cancer. 2023 Oct;11(10):. PMID: 37852737

results.title: Dapagliflozin-associated euglycemic diabetic ketoacidosis in a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus
results.text_hl: A 76-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ with a 40-year history of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ (@DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@), for which @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (1000 mg/day) and @CHEMICAL_dapagliflozin @CHEMICAL_MESH:C529054 @@@dapagliflozin@@@ (10 mg/day) were prescribed, presented with malaise, @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, and @DISEASE_Oliguria @DISEASE_MESH:D009846 @@@oliguria@@@.

citations.NLM: Lee IH, Ahn DJ. Dapagliflozin-associated euglycemic diabetic ketoacidosis in a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus Medicine (Baltimore). 2020 May 22;99(21):e20228. PMID: 32481295
citations.BibTeX: @article{32481295, title={Dapagliflozin-associated euglycemic diabetic ketoacidosis in a patient with type 2 diabetes mellitus}, author={Lee IH and Ahn DJ}, journal={Medicine (Baltimore)}, volume={99}, number={21}, pages={e20228}}

results.title: COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.
results.text_hl: Seventeen years prior, she was diagnosed with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ 1.5 g twice a day and @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@ 10 mg twice a day were part of her therapy regimen.

citations.NLM: Bereda G. COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report. Ann Med Surg (Lond). 2024 Dec;86(12):7318-7321. PMID: 39649935
citations.BibTeX: @article{39649935, title={COVID-19 is associated with high blood glucose levels: diabetic neuropathy during the SARS-CoV-2 pandemic: a case report.}, author={Bereda G}, journal={Ann Med Surg (Lond)}, volume={86}, number={12}, pages={7318-7321}}

results.title: Response of Breast Cancer Cells and Cancer Stem Cells to Metformin and Hyperthermia Alone or Combined
results.text_hl: We therefore investigate the combined effect of @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@-range @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@hyperthermia@@@ with 30 microM @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ by heating the cells at 39.5 C for 6 h and culturing the cells for 18 day with 30 microM @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ at 37 C.

citations.NLM: Lee H, Park HJ, Park CS, Oh ET, Choi BH, Williams B, Lee CK, Song CW. Response of Breast Cancer Cells and Cancer Stem Cells to Metformin and Hyperthermia Alone or Combined PLoS One. 2014;9(2):e87979. PMID: 24505341

results.title: Metformin/glibenclamide-related interstitial lung disease: a case report.
results.text_hl: Herein, we describe the case of a 78-yr-old Caucasian @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@woman@@@ who developed mild dyspnoea at rest, @DISEASE_Asthenia @DISEASE_MESH:D001247 @@@asthenia@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@ while on treatment with oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (2000 mg/day) and @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@ (12.5 mg/day).

citations.NLM: Zuccarini G, Bocchino M, Assante LR, Rea G, Sanduzzi A. Metformin/glibenclamide-related interstitial lung disease: a case report. Sarcoidosis Vasc Diffuse Lung Dis. 2014 Jul 8;31(2):170-3. PMID: 25078646

results.title: [Metformin and Diabetes: still has a sense of its use in patients CKD stage II or is an additional risk factor?]
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @DISEASE_Dehydration @DISEASE_MESH:D003681 @@@dehydration@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Fever</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005334 @@@fever@@@, IRC II stadium, undiagnosed caused, in a very short time, an accumulation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, which has been the cause of @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@metabolic acidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Pontoriero A, Saporita A, Ricciardi CA, Ricciardi BR. [Metformin and Diabetes: still has a sense of its use in patients CKD stage II or is an additional risk factor?] G Ital Nefrol. 2015 Dec;35(Suppl 71):. PMID: 29710445

results.title: A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci.
results.text_hl: Medications were @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@, @CHEMICAL_Cholecalciferol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002762 @@@cholecalciferol@@@, @CHEMICAL_Folic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005492 @@@folic acid@@@, a multivitamin, @CHEMICAL_Fluticasone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068298 @@@fluticasone@@@ by inhalation, and, as needed, @CHEMICAL_Ipratropium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009241 @@@ipratropium@@@ by inhalation.

citations.NLM: Famularo G, Sordillo P, Stasolla A, Parisi MG. A 58-Year-Old Woman With Pneumonia and Gram-Negative Diplococci. Chest. 2017 Oct;152(4):e95-e97. PMID: 28991556

results.title: [Management of hyperglycemia in the non-critical hospitalized patients with oral feeding].
results.text_hl: She was on treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ 850 mg/bid, @CHEMICAL_glimepiride @CHEMICAL_MESH:C057619 @@@glimepiride@@@ 4 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_candesartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:C081643 @@@candesartan@@@ 16 mg/day, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@ 10mg/day and @CHEMICAL_Aspirin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001241 @@@acetylsalicylic acid@@@ 100mg/day.

citations.NLM: Jansen S, Buonaiuto V, Márquez-Gómez I, Gómez-Huelgas R. [Management of hyperglycemia in the non-critical hospitalized patients with oral feeding]. Rev Clin Esp. 2012 Feb;212(2):84-9. PMID: 21798530
